com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic

Class NegatedLiteral

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic.ExpressionObject
      • com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic.BooleanExpression
        • com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic.Negation
          • com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic.NegatedLiteral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, Formula, Literal, java.lang.Comparable<Formula>

    public class NegatedLiteral
extends Negation
implements Literal
    The negation of a literal is a literal.
    Author:
    Stephen G. Ware
